organic.title: Vital Vegas (@VitalVegas) / X
organic.snippet: More MGM Resorts casinos going smoke-free in Las Vegas like Park MGM. Great news—as go the big guys, others follow. 138. 71. 1,180. Vital Vegas · @VitalVegas.

organic.title: Las Vegas Issues (@VegasIssues) / X
organic.snippet: MGM Resorts has been hit with a cyber security attack. Everything from gaming machines to hotel communications have mostly been inoperable for four days now.

organic.title: X \ Vital Vegas (VitalVegas@)
organic.snippet: Best twist yet in the MGM cyberattack saga: Source says a guy went up to the cage at Mandalay Bay and demanded $40 million to stop the ransomware attack.
